scripts.build.linux: cp src/index.js index.js && sed -i .tmp "s/PLATFORM/linux/g" index.js && node index.js
scripts.build.mac: cp src/index.js index.js && sed -i .tmp "s/PLATFORM/mac/g" index.js && node index.js
scripts.build.win32: cp src/index.js index.js && sed -i .tmp "s/PLATFORM/win32/g" index.js && node index.js
scripts.postinstall: yarn build.linux && yarn build.mac && yarn build.win32
scripts.prepare: yarn package.linux && yarn package.mac && yarn package.win32
